languages.text: {n}Вокруг открытого глаза техножреца появляются слабые морщинки, словно под маской-респиратором он улыбается.{/n} "Прерывание жизненных функций — феномен неизбежный, а потому незначимый. Доктрина служения отвергает страх смерти".

{n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокруг открытого глаза техножреца появляются слабые морщинки, словно под маской-респиратором он улыбается.{/n} "Прерывание жизненных функций — феномен неизбежный, а потому незначимый. Доктрина служения отвергает страх смерти".

traits.locale_text: {n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of servitude renounces the fear of death."

{n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of servitude renounces the fear of death."

{n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."

{n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."

{n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."

languages.text: {n}技术神甫的眼角露出了细微的皱纹，仿佛他在呼吸器面罩下笑了起来。{/n}“生体机能的终止属于不可避免的现象，因此不足为虑。我们的信条已经摒弃了对死亡的恐惧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术祭司的眼角露出了细微的皱纹，仿佛他在呼吸器面罩下笑了起来。{/n}“生体机能的终止属于不可避免的现象，因此不足为虑。我们的信条已经摒弃了对死亡的恐惧。”

languages.text: {n}Aparecen unas pequeñas arrugas alrededor del ojo expuesto del tecnosacerdote, como si sonriera bajo su máscara respiradora.{/n} «El cese de las funciones vitales es un fenómeno inevitable y, por lo tanto, insignificante. La doctrina de la fe repudia el miedo a la muerte».
languages.original_text: {n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aparecen unas pequeñas arrugas alrededor del ojo expuesto del tecnosacerdote, como si sonriera bajo su máscara respiradora.{/n} «El cese de las funciones vitales es un fenómeno inevitable y, por lo tanto, insignificante. La doctrina de la fe repudia el miedo a la muerte».

languages.text: {n}呼吸器を保護するマスクの下でほほえんだかのように、技術司祭の露出した目のまわりに小じわがよる。{/n}「生命機能の停止は避けられない現象だ、取るに足りないものだよ。信仰の教義によって死への恐怖は排除されている」
languages.original_text: {n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."

traits.locale_text: {n}呼吸器を保護するマスクの下でほほえんだかのように、技術司祭の露出した目のまわりに小じわがよる。{/n}「生命機能の停止は避けられない現象だ、取るに足りないものだよ。信仰の教義によって死への恐怖は排除されている」

languages.text: {n}Des petites rides apparaissent autour de l'œil visible du technoprêtre, comme s'il souriait sous son respirateur.{/n} « L'arrêt des fonctions vitales est un phénomène inéluctable et, par conséquent, insignifiant. La doctrine du culte rejette la crainte de la mort. »
languages.original_text: {n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Des petites rides apparaissent autour de l'œil visible du technoprêtre, comme s'il souriait sous son respirateur.{/n} « L'arrêt des fonctions vitales est un phénomène inéluctable et, par conséquent, insignifiant. La doctrine du culte rejette la crainte de la mort. »

languages.text: {n}Kleine Fältchen bilden sich um das entblößte Auge des Techpriesters, als würde er unter seiner Atemmaske lächeln.{/n} "Das Unterbinden von Vitalfunktionen ist ein unvermeidbares Phänomen und daher als solches unbedeutend. Die Doktrin der Anbetung schließt die Angst vor dem Tod aus."
languages.original_text: {n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kleine Fältchen bilden sich um das entblößte Auge des Techpriesters, als würde er unter seiner Atemmaske lächeln.{/n} "Das Unterbinden von Vitalfunktionen ist ein unvermeidbares Phänomen und daher als solches unbedeutend. Die Doktrin der Anbetung schließt die Angst vor dem Tod aus."

languages.original_text: {n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."

languages.text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in açıkta kalan gözünün çevresinde, sanki solunum maskesinin altından gülümsüyormuş gibi küçük kırışıklıklar oluşuyor.{/n} "Hayati işlevlerin durması kaçınılmaz bir olgudur, bu nedenle ehemmiyetsizdir. Tapınma öğretisi, ölüm korkusunu tanımaz."
languages.original_text: {n}Small wrinkles gather around the Tech-Priest's exposed eye as if he is smiling under his respirator mask.{/n} "Cessation of vital functions is an unavoidable phenomenon and therefore an insignificant one. The doctrine of worship repudiates the fear of death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno Rahip'in açıkta kalan gözünün çevresinde, sanki solunum maskesinin altından gülümsüyormuş gibi küçük kırışıklıklar oluşuyor.{/n} "Hayati işlevlerin durması kaçınılmaz bir olgudur, bu nedenle ehemmiyetsizdir. Tapınma öğretisi, ölüm korkusunu tanımaz."
